wellcome.help_one: Connect with friends and fellow food lovers. Share your culinary adventures, discover new restaurants, and chat about your passion for food—all in one place.
wellcome.help_two: YumYarn is your go-to platform for all things food. Whether you're a seasoned foodie or just starting your culinary journey, we've got something for everyone.

helping.Introduce1: Political, election, and religious activities are prohibited on the Yumyarn social network.
helping.Introduce2: Posting content intended for criminal purposes or promoting criminal behavior is prohibited.
helping.Prohibited_Actions1: Posts containing obscene language, discriminatory remarks, or ethically problematic viewpoints are prohibited.
helping.Prohibited_Actions2: Posts that cause distress or negatively affect other users are prohibited.
helping.Inappropriate_content2: Publicly disclosing personal information without the consent of the person concerned is prohibited.
helping.Identity_and_Privacy1: Posts containing false or misleading information are prohibited.
helping.Identity_and_Privacy2: Posting content that defames individuals, companies, specific countries, or regions is prohibited.
helping.Slanderous_content1: Impersonating individuals, organizations, or Yumyarn is prohibited.
helping.Slanderous_content2: Advertising your own products, stores, or company, or other commercial content is prohibited.
helping.Violation_of_law_and_ethics1: Actions that infringe on the copyrights, trademark rights, portrait rights, or privacy rights of users, third parties, or Yumyarn are prohibited.
helping.Advertising_and_commerce1: Posts introducing your own products, stores, or company, or containing other advertising or commercial content.
helping.Spam_and_Malware1: Actions that obstruct or interfere with the management of the Yumyarn social network are prohibited.
helping.Intervention_and_management1: Other actions that Yumyarn or Ajinomoto Co., Inc. deems inappropriate are prohibited.

about.Profile: A social networking app where food lovers unite. Sharing food pictures, food locations, searching for delicious restaurants, or simply chatting about the passion for food—all can be done easily on this platform.
about.manage: Person in charge of application management:

messenge.seen_d: People can see when you've read their messages, but only if both you and they have this feature turned on.
messenge.auto_mes_d: Automatically send messages to people who interact with your promoted posts.
messenge.nofriends: People who follow each other will be considered friends.
messenge.delete_noti: Notifications will be automatically deleted after 7 days.

error.reported: You've already submitted this report. Please wait.

pack.auto_review: You can add automated messages when users interact.

pack.follow: Track user engagement with your content.
